column5: That road salt is poisoning our groundwater and lakes. DUH!!  Effects of road salt
And Im sure liquid deicing is soooooooo much better!!!!!!!!!
Tis true, but we support it by paying taxes and using the roads.  Same goes for burning gasoline and oil in our cars, trucks and boats.  We are doomed I tells' ya.
It is one of the reasons the lower Don has remained a dead zone. City of Toronto has dumped it's snow in the valley, by the viaduct, for decades.
